urlText: Diversion at Cattai and Wisemans Ferry
content:
Buses are diverting away from Cattai Road, north of Cattai Public School to Wisemans Ferry, due to road closures due to flooding.
  • Buses are finishing their trips at Cattai Public School instead, missing 20 stops.
  • School buses are running from Sackville Ferry to Hawkesbury High School, missing 6 stops.
  • School students should hail buses as required.
subtitle: Diversion at Cattai and Wisemans Ferry

properties.smsText: Diversion at Cattai and Wisemans Ferry
properties.speechText: At Cattai and Wisemans Ferry, route 672 and school buses are diverting away from Cattai Road, north of Cattai Public School to Wisemans Ferry, due to road closures due to flooding. Buses are finishing their trips at Cattai Public School instead, missing 20  stops. School buses are running from Sackville Ferry to Hawkesbury High School, missing 6 stops. School students should hail buses as required.

destination.name: Wiseman Ferry East Bank, Old Northern Rd, Wisemans Ferry

lines.name: School buses 5112
lines.description: Sackville Ferry Rd at Manning Rd to Hawkesbury HS
